lexUnit.name: necklace.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an ornamental chain or string of beads, jewels, or links worn round the neck.

sentence.text: When she and her husband have the chance to attend a ball , a rather grand function , she borrows an exquisite necklace from an acquaintance .
